questions.question: Economics ............................. his favourite subject.
questions.description: Some nouns look plural with -s but they take a singular verb. Examples are: physics, mathematics, economics, mumps, measles, diabetes, rabies, news, politics, ethics, athletics, gymnastics, aerobics.

questions.description: Use a plural verb with jeans, trousers, pants, scissors, pliers etc.

questions.question: My family ............................. lived in this house for twenty years.
questions.description: Family can be followed by either a singular or a plural verb.
